LanguageData.RWP_Artillery.label: Artillery
LanguageData.RWP_Artillery.description: Unlocks the ability to manufacture the 12-pounder Napoleon cannon and the 12-pound Coehorn mortar.
LanguageData.RWP_GatlingGun.label: Gatling Gun
LanguageData.RWP_GatlingGun.description: Unlocks the ability to manufacture the Model 1881 Gatling gun.
LanguageData.RWP_LawEnforcement.label: law enforcement
LanguageData.RWP_LawEnforcement.description: Unlocks the ability to manufacture and issue town law enforcement badges.
LanguageData.RWP_Optometry.label: Basic optometry
LanguageData.RWP_Optometry.description: Unlocks the ability to manufacture spectacles.
LanguageData.RWP_Watchmaking.label: watchmaking
LanguageData.RWP_Watchmaking.description: Unlocks the ability to manufacture pocketwatches.
LanguageData.RWP_WesternApparel.label: Old West apparel
LanguageData.RWP_WesternApparel.description: Unlocks the ability to manufacture various advanced western apparel.
